parameters.name:
Condition
Specifies
parameters.description:
an item's condition. If Condition is set to “All”, a separate set of responses is returned for each valid value of Condition.

Type: String

Default: New

Valid Values: All | Collectible | Refurbished | Used
No

parameters.name:
ItemId
Specifies
parameters.description:
the item you want to look up. An ItemId is an alphanumeric identifier assigned to an item. You can specify up to ten ItemIds separated by commas.

Type: String

Default: None

Valid Values: ASIN
Yes

parameters.name:
MerchantId
An
parameters.description:
optional parameter that can be used to filter search results and offer listings to only include items sold by Amazon. By default, Product Advertising API returns items sold by various merchants including Amazon. Enter "Amazon" to return only items sold by Amazon.

Type: String

Valid Values: Amazon
No

parameters.name:
SimilarityType
"Intersection"
parameters.description:
returns the intersection of items that are similar to all of the ASINs specified. "Random" returns the union of items that are similar to all of the ASINs specified. Only ten items are returned. So, if there are more than ten similar items found, a random selection from the group is returned. For this reason, running the same request multiple times can yield different results.

Type: String

Default: Intersection

Valid Value:Random
No

parameters.name:
ResponseGroup
Specifies
parameters.description:
the types of values to return. You can specify multiple response groups in one request by separating them with commas.

Type: String

Default: Request | Small

Valid Values: Accessories | BrowseNodes | EditorialReview | Images | Large | ItemAttributes | ItemIds | Medium | Offers | OfferSummary | PromotionSummary | Reviews | SalesRank | Similarities | Small | Tracks | Variations | VariationSummary |
No
